terms.accommodation: Accommodation is arranged in homestays with half board. No allowance is made for absence from the homestay during the arranged period. Single room requests for 16-17-year-old students are not guaranteed during July and August.
terms.insurance: Medi-PEL is mandatory for students on ILEP. The cost is €130 per annum and includes PEL. Medical insurance is activated upon completion of a form and evidence of a policy number.
terms.activities: Optional excursions cost between €15-€25 for half days and €55-€65 for full days.
terms.tuition_hours: Standard Course: 15 contact hours/week, excluding breaks. Intensive Course: 22 contact hours/week, excluding breaks.
terms.policy_of_care: Strict policy of care for 16-17 year old students. Contact CES for more information.
terms.school_holidays: 01 January, 18 April, 01 April, 05 May, 26 May, 25 August, 22 December 2025 - 02 January 2026 (No refund or time given in lieu for public holidays).
terms.medical_insurance: Students are advised to arrange travel insurance to cover loss of possessions and tuition fees.
terms.no_holiday_refunds: No refunds for missed holidays or school closures.
terms.teaching_info: All teaching / tuition hours are 45 minutes. Maximum class size is 16.
terms.policy_on_care: CES takes responsibility for students under 19 years in adult schools. Contact CES for more information.
terms.general: Georgian College policies applied, and insurance is required as part of tenancy.

policies.school_holidays: 01 Jan, 18 Apr, 21 Apr, 05 May, 26 May, 25 Aug, 22 Dec 2025 - 02 Jan 2026. No refund or time is given in lieu for public holidays.
policies.social_activities: Variety of social activities available. Costs: Full day £40-£85; Half day £20-£45.

accommodation.description: Cancellation of accommodation with less than 28 days notice may incur charges.

tuition_and_fees.notice_period: Up to 14 days prior to the start date.

visa_refusal.policy: Refund applies upon receipt of visa refusal notice. Registration fee is non-refundable in Canada.

amendment_fee.details: €50 (Ireland) / £50 (UK) / $50 (Canada) for changes plus any price differences.

general_conditions: Fees include use of facilities and supervised self-access study.
No credit will be provided for lessons missed due to late arrival or public holidays.
CES is not responsible for loss of belongings.
terms.important_note: All cancellations must be notified in writing.
